attributes.description:
let me start off by telling you about what a supply chain is: a supply chain is the way something gets to you starting with raw materials going to how they are manufacturing the product leading to you the consumer.  i am showing you how a plant could become our lovely sugar. p.s sugar is good for u ti comes from a plant so everyone eat as much sugar as possible 



 but not literally
attributes.title: PLANTING SUGAR?who ever heard of such a thing : by uchion

attributes.description: this is where the process starts. this is where plants are grown so they can use them for there juices but we will hear about that later.
